title: Authors and Citation
text: Kenny C (2023). luigg: Mario Themed 'ggplot2' Extensions. https://github.com/christopherkenny/luigg, http://christophertkenny.com/luigg/.
code: @Manual{,   title = {luigg: Mario Themed 'ggplot2' Extensions},   author = {Christopher T. Kenny},   year = {2023},   note = {https://github.com/christopherkenny/luigg, http://christophertkenny.com/luigg/}, }

title: Mario Themed ggplot2 Extensions
text: luigg provide silly, Mario-themed ggplot extensions.

title: Mario Themed ggplot2 Extensions
text: can install development version luigg GitHub :

title: Mario Themed ggplot2 Extensions
text: basic example shows solve common problem: Imagine need warp pipe bar graph. Look .
code: library(luigg) ## basic example code set.seed(1) data.frame(x = as.character(1:4), n = 100 * runif(n = 4, 0, .5)) |> ggplot2::ggplot(ggplot2::aes(x = x, y = n, fill = x)) +  geom_pipe() +  scale_fill_luigg(palette = 'warp_pipe') +  ggplot2::theme_void()

title: Warp Pipe Bar Graph — geom_pipe
code: geom_pipe(   mapping = NULL,   data = NULL,   stat = "identity",   position = "identity",   rule = "evenodd",   ...,   na.rm = FALSE,   show.legend = NA,   inherit.aes = TRUE )

title: Warp Pipe Bar Graph — geom_pipe
text: mapping Set aesthetic mappings created aes(). specified inherit.aes = TRUE (default), combined default mapping top level plot. must supply mapping plot mapping. data data displayed layer. three options: NULL, default, data inherited plot data specified call ggplot(). data.frame, object, override plot data. objects fortified produce data frame. See fortify() variables created. function called single argument, plot data. return value must data.frame, used layer data. function can created formula (e.g. ~ head(.x, 10)). stat statistical transformation use data layer, either ggproto Geom subclass string naming stat stripped stat_ prefix (e.g. "count" rather "stat_count") position Position adjustment, either string naming adjustment (e.g. "jitter" use position_jitter), result call position adjustment function. Use latter need change settings adjustment. rule Either "evenodd" "winding". polygons holes drawn (using subgroup aesthetic) argument defines hole coordinates interpreted. See examples grid::pathGrob() explanation. ... arguments passed layer(). often aesthetics, used set aesthetic fixed value, like colour = "red" size = 3. may also parameters paired geom/stat. na.rm FALSE, default, missing values removed warning. TRUE, missing values silently removed. show.legend logical. layer included legends? NA, default, includes aesthetics mapped. FALSE never includes, TRUE always includes. can also named logical vector finely select aesthetics display. inherit.aes FALSE, overrides default aesthetics, rather combining . useful helper functions define data aesthetics inherit behaviour default plot specification, e.g. borders().

title: Warp Pipe Bar Graph — geom_pipe
code: set.seed(1) data.frame(x = as.character(1:4), n = 100 * runif(n = 4, 0, .5)) |>  ggplot2::ggplot(ggplot2::aes(x = x, y = n, fill = x)) +   geom_pipe() +   scale_fill_luigg(palette = 'warp_pipe') +   ggplot2::theme_void()

title: Mario Brothers Color Palettes — luigg
text: Included palettes: super_mario, Super Mario Bros. palette (Politis et al 2017) double_dash, Mario Kart Double Dash palette

title: Mario Brothers Color Palettes — luigg
text: Dionysios Politis et. al. International Journal New Technologies Science Engineering Vol. 4, Issue. 1, Jan 2017, ISSN 2349-0780

what: Mario and Luigi Color Scales for ggplot2 — scale_color_luigg
title: Mario and Luigi Color Scales for ggplot2 — scale_color_luigg
Mario and Luigi Color Scales for ggplot2 — scale_color_luigg
code: scale_color_luigg(palette = "super_mario", which = NULL, ..., reverse = FALSE)  scale_fill_luigg(palette = "super_mario", which = NULL, ..., reverse = FALSE)  scale_colour_luigg(palette = "super_mario", which = NULL, ..., reverse = FALSE)

title: Mario and Luigi Color Scales for ggplot2 — scale_color_luigg
text: palette palette names(luigg) use numeric indices colors use. NULL default. ... arguments passed ggplot2::discrete_scale() reverse vector reversed? Default FALSE.

title: Mario and Luigi Color Scales for ggplot2 — scale_color_luigg
Mario and Luigi Color Scales for ggplot2 — scale_color_luigg
code: library(ggplot2) ggplot2::mpg |>   ggplot() +    geom_point(aes(displ, hwy, colour = class)) +    scale_color_luigg(palette = 'warp_pipe')   ggplot2::mpg |>   ggplot() +    geom_point(aes(displ, hwy, fill = class), pch = 23, color = 'transparent') +    scale_fill_luigg(palette = 'warp_pipe')
